definition:
&%BedAttribute is the class of attributes
attached to the type of cushion a &%Bed has
opposite_reasoning: BedAttribute is a highly specific concept describing cushion properties of beds, making true antonyms difficult. HardnessAttribute provides the best semantic opposition because it directly contrasts with the implied softness/comfort properties that bed cushion attributes typically describe. While not a perfect opposition, it creates a meaningful spectrum for Fisher-LDA (soft/comfortable ↔ hard/uncomfortable) that could help distinguish furniture comfort attributes. However, this is a weak pairing overall due to the specificity of BedAttribute.
